verses.verse: Vindicate<WH8199> me, O God,<WH430> and plead<WH7378> my case<WH7379> against<WH4480> an ungodly<WH2623> <WH3808> nation;<WH1471> O deliver<WH6403> me from the deceitful<WH4820> and unjust<WH9390> man!<WH376>
For Thou art the God<WH430> of my strength;<WH4581> why<WH4100> hast Thou rejected<WH2186> me? Why<WH4100> do I go<WH1980> mourning<WH6937> because of the oppression<WH3906> of the enemy<WH340>?
O send<WH7971> out Thy light<WH216> and Thy truth,<WH571> let them lead<WH5148> me; Let them bring<WH935> me to Thy holy<WH6944> hill,<WH2022> And to Thy dwelling<WH4908> places.<WH4908>
Then I will go<WH935> to the altar<WH4196> of God,<WH430> To God<WH410> my exceeding<WH8057> joy;<WH8057> And upon the lyre<WH3658> I shall praise<WH3034> Thee, O God,<WH430> my God.<WH430>

Why<WH4100> are you in despair,<WH7817> O my soul<WH5315>? And why<WH4100> are you disturbed<WH1993> within<WH5921> me? Hope<WH3176> in God,<WH430> for I shall again<WH5750> praise<WH3034> Him, The help<WH3444> of my countenance,<WH6440> and my God.<WH430>
